import React from 'react' import {Container,Row,Col,Button} from 'react-bootstrap'; import styles from './CurrentForecast.module.css'; const CurrentForecast = ({location,temperature,weatherIcon,weatherDescription,country,weekday,date,himidity}) => { const newWeatherIcon = weatherIcon.replace("'",""); console.log() return ( {location} / {country} {weekday} - {date}
{temperature}°
 {weatherDescription} pays pays pays ) } export default CurrentForecast
